# MISC::CLEAR_AREA_OF_COPS

## Summary
Clears all non-mission cops within the defined sphere

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** centreCoorsX
* **FLOAT** centreCoorsY
* **FLOAT** centreCoorsZ
* **FLOAT** radius
* **BOOL** broadcast = false:
If set an event is sent over the network in MP to do the same clear area on all other machines.
Please avoid using this if you can.

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
flags appears to always be 0
